key_mistakes.reason: This move loses significant material advantage and misses an opportunity to improve the position.
This move weakens the pawn structure and exposes the king to potential threats.
This move fails to address the immediate threats and leads to a losing position.
This move allows the opponent to consolidate their advantage and control the board.
This move overlooks a critical defensive resource, leading to a rapid deterioration of the position.

recommendations: Focus on maintaining a solid pawn structure and avoid weakening your king's safety.
Improve your tactical awareness to spot potential threats earlier.
Consider the value of pieces and avoid unnecessary exchanges that can lead to material imbalances.
Practice positional play to better control the board and limit your opponent's options.
